name: Bad Goats WebGL
description:
Rotation : Arrow Keys

Jump : Space Bar

Toss : E

This game was made for Boğaziçi Game Jam in 48 hours. We will continue to develop.

if you enjoy this game pls rate us
https://itch.io/jam/bogazici-game-jam/rate/1071440

There must be at least 2 players in front of the sign "START GAME" to start the game
